data.text: Nnome nka mo a mogye mo ho die wɔ Sion,
Ɛno enti, mobɛka atukɔfoɔ a wɔdi ɛkan no ho;
Otumfoɔ Awurade aka ne ho ntam
Sɛ wogya nnipa edu wɔ efie baako mu a, wɔn nso bɛwuwu.
Na sɛ obusuani a ɔrebɛhye awufoɔ no ba sɛ ɔrebɛfa wɔn afiri efie hɔ na ɔbisa obi a wakɔtɛ sɛ, “Obi ka wo ho anaa?” Na ɔbuaa sɛ, “Dabi” a, afei ɔbɛka sɛ, “Mua wʼano!” Ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔbɔ Awurade din.
Apɔnkɔ tu mmirika wɔ abotan a apaapae so anaa?
Mo a moani gye Lo-debar nkoguo ho,
Deɛ Asafo Awurade Onyankopɔn seɛ nie: “Mɛhwanyan ɔman bi abɛtia mo, Ao Israelfoɔ,
